name: Escape From The Jaynkimus
description:
You are the captain of ship who has woken up to find the ship has lost power and life support. Craft items and talk to the crew as you uncover what really happened...

Created by a team in the Jaynky DIY (discord) community

Features:

  • Multiple endings
  • Easy & Hard difficulty
  •  Secrets
  • Human Salsa
  • And much more!
